titleStmt.title: Dream Harran
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.

spanGrp.span: Tonight, I had a beatiful dream; in the night I had a dream. I dreamt that I was at Aḥmad’s house, ʕAli’s brother, his brother in law. His brother who is older than him. Aḥmad whom we call Aḥmad Güčtakin; Aḥmad whose children sell liver, liver kebabs.
I dreamt that I was at his house and that, when I was at his house, there was a heap of wheat, but what sort of wheat! How good!
You may say its grains were like flint stones; it was such good wheat that it drove me crazy. I mean because the wheat was so good.
They were standing: Aḥmad and his wife, his spouse, and his mother. God bless his mother’s soul, she has passed away.
They were well-groomed and dressed in beautiful clothes, their faces were beautiful, how beautiful! Like that.
They wanted to travel, they wanted to go on a trip and I was at their place looking at the wheat. I was thrilled about the quality of the wheat.
And next to the wheat Maʕrūf was praying, our neighbor Maʕrūf. Maʕrūf has a good heart and he prays a good prayer that is accepted (by God).
And there was Xalīl also praying. Xalīl the barber, we call him the barber, the landlord of our shop.
He, Xallē, was praying too, but you may say that his prayer is not accepted. Like you say there is something that causes itching; like this, it sleeps
in his body like that and he scratches himself while praying. His prayer will not be accepted; he wants to pray, but he cannot pray because he always scratches himself.
Xallē cannot keep his mouth. That is why I am saying that, I mean, because I swear that I saw him.

Because he is praying correctly according to the Islamic rules, but his mouth Whenever he sees two people, he immediately creates troubles between them, he creates strife among them, I mean, his tongue is a little bit bad, he does not know the (limit) of his tongue.
That is why I am saying that his prayer does not get accepted. The one who prays, the Muslim, he must he is called a Muslim.
If he prays; the one who prays must not do any bad thing. The one who does a bad thing will not benefit from his prayer.
The one who does a bad thing will not benefit from his prayer. I mean his prayer is just an effort, but there is nothing in it but getting tired.
I saw Aḥmad al-ᵊḤḏ̣ariyye, God knows that his mother is very good. I was talking to myself, saying that yesterday we milled five sacks of wheat.
Our wheat is small, but I take it, God knows, the wheat is our daily bread (provided by God). Hopefully the Lord of the Worlds will see the wheat.
It was a lot. I really liked my dream, it made me happy, my dream made me happy, I mean, I took pleasure in it, I liked it. Enjoy it!
